attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is neccessary for the smoking age to be 21 in order to protect young people from falling foul to the dangers of smoking and will make it harder for under-16s to get hold of cigarettes.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/youngsmokers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
